value:
$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$bEvBG_OP_00_v0611b_00|$Fi2000|$WmMPID_アスク,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Shall we, Embla? The mortals are
waiting for us. Come now...$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|What does it matter.$k$pTheir lives will come to an end soon
anyway. They have such short lives...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|That they do! And yet, the mortals
are filled with a hope that they carry
with them into their futures.$k$pTheir eyes well full of that hope.
Once you've met them, you'll see!$k$p$bEvBG_OP_00_v0611b_sky|$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Pain|That is what I most detest.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|I wish I could let you see them
the way that I do, Embla.$k$p$EFace_Normal2|Even without power like ours at their
disposal, they still manage to keep
hold of their hope.$k$pMidgard is bare, empty of vegetation.
Many of the mortals are now starving.$k$p$EFace|But if we were to lend them some
of our power, there is a chance we
can keep them from such a fate!$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Normal2|You make no sense. But fine. Do not
let me stop you. Do as you please.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|I was hoping you might join me...
They are sure to be thankful—you
may change your mind about them!$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Normal2|I have no interest in such frivolity.$k$pThough, if it will slake your desires
to have me witness these mortals,
I can join you this once...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Excellent! I know you will see them
as I do. And you, too, can lend them
aid with your power!$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|I make no promises of any aid.$k$p$Sbs5000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$bEvBg_EmbraDarkOutside2|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|...W-was that...$k$pWere those Embla's memories?$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|You...you...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I cannot say that I know what to make
of this myself, but it seems Embla
still lives.$k$pThe power of the key should be
enough to cast down even those
of godly stature, yet...$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|It will be you who are...cast down!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE16_13,0|$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Pain|Not yet... Must...kill...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Embla is getting away!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The castle of Embla stands up ahead.
Were I to guess, I would believe she
plans go there to recover her strength.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|After her! We must bring an end to
this as soon as we're able!$k$p$Sbs150|

$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$bEvBg_EmbraAnotherThrone_before|$Fi2500|$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Cool2|Ah, Embla! How are you faring?$k$p$EFace|Oh! This must be... Embla, how
wonderful! This is quite a tribute
from the mortals! Impressive.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Normal2|I told them I had no need for such
things, and yet they kept on bringing
gifts...one after another after another.$k$pFoolish.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|But imagine the decorations you
could create with all this!$k$pI am happy to see you and the
mortals get along.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Normal2|Predictable. Which I may never
understand... What is my happiness
to you?$k$pWhy must you always meddle in the
lives of others. Does the happiness
of others please you so much?$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Smile|You are welcome, Embla.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|Wha— I was not thanking you.
I just fail to understand.$k$p$EFace_Normal2|Nevertheless...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Oh? Was there something else?$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face|It is as you said... There is something
about mortals. And once they have
been lent power, well...$k$pYour interest in them is no longer
wholly a mystery to me.$k$pAlone, I could never have imagined
such a thing, and yet...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Truly? Embla, I am so glad to hear
you say so! And as I said, you are
most welcome.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|I was not...thanking you...$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|
